forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. E winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 56F. ENE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 52F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 39F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
